title: After The Laughter
itunes:title: After The Laughter
description:
On this episode of TGC we discuss gang leader Cleamon Johnson defending himself in court. Marijuana and fertility, former Sheriff Lee Baca's bail being denied and we get a phone call from TGC co-host Reggie Wright Jr. from Atwater Penitentiary on one of course. CHECK THIS OUT Make sure you subscribe to our YouTube channel Digital Soapbox Network and follow us on Instagram @Thegangsterchroniclespodcast We are inviting 3 lucky people to come hang out with us at a live taping of the show. The rules are simple:1. Download the Himalaya podcast app and follow The Gangster Chronicles 2. Screenshot the TGC page on the app and tag our Instagram page leaving the following hashtag#HimalayaTGC. This first contest is open to So Cal residents only. We have a National contest coming soon. Click to download the Himalaya app See omnystudio.com/policies/listener for privacy information.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
